Sentencas: The cathode is a key part in solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) that largely determines the cell power output and lifetime, and consequently the competitiveness of this attractive technology.
Titulo: A single-/double-perovskite composite with an overwhelming single-perovskite phase for the oxygen reduction reaction at intermediate temperatures

Sentencas: Thus, the catalysts for cathodes with high electro-catalytic activity and good stability for the oxygen reduction reaction (ORR) at the intermediate temperature range are vital.
Titulo: A single-/double-perovskite composite with an overwhelming single-perovskite phase for the oxygen reduction reaction at intermediate temperatures

Sentencas: Herein, a single-perovskite (SP)/double-perovskite (DP) composite with the nominal composition of SrCo0.7Fe0.2W0.1O3 delta is designed.
Titulo: A single-/double-perovskite composite with an overwhelming single-perovskite phase for the oxygen reduction reaction at intermediate temperatures

Sentencas: During the synthesis, a slightly W-doped SP and a W-rich B-site cation ordered DP with the dominant SP phase of approximately 80 wt% are formed simultaneously.
Titulo: A single-/double-perovskite composite with an overwhelming single-perovskite phase for the oxygen reduction reaction at intermediate temperatures

Sentencas: This new composite shows obviously enhanced stability owing to the W doping effect in the SP phase and increased activity from the synergistic effect between the SP and DP phases compared to the W-free SrCo0.8Fe0.2O3 - delta perovskite.
Titulo: A single-/double-perovskite composite with an overwhelming single-perovskite phase for the oxygen reduction reaction at intermediate temperatures

Sentencas: We anticipate that the synthesis of this perovskite-type composite could pave the way to discover more perovskite-based composite catalysts for SOFCs.
Titulo: A single-/double-perovskite composite with an overwhelming single-perovskite phase for the oxygen reduction reaction at intermediate temperatures
